title: Mastery Mini Icons
body:
(Patch 7.23) Hello,
I want to know if the mini icons going to return into the game, cause yesterday I want to bought Katarina icon, and when I login the icons already disappeared can somebody help me?
Thanks
PS: we gonna have more icons?

replies.body: The [essence emporium](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088-The-Essence-Emporium-FAQ) has closed shop for now, but it may return in the future! I thought the more chibi icons were cute, I'd love to see more in the future myself but we don't have any details for that.  Keep your eyes on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for future announcements!
